Title.evidence: The P re- O perative W indow of E ndocrine Therapy to Inform R adiation Therapy Decisions (POWER, NCT04272801 ) Trial

Trial_Design.evidence: 37 POWER Trial participants who completed pre-ET and surgery

Participants.evidence: older women with early-stage, ER-positive breast cancer

Objective.evidence: aims to determine whether 3 months of pre-operative endocrine therapy (pre-ET) informs adjuvant radiation therapy decisions

Method_Outcome.evidence: Ki-67 decreased from 13% in biopsy specimens to 5% in the lumpectomy specimens

Number_Analysed.evidence: 37 POWER Trial participants who completed pre-ET and surgery

Result_Outcome.evidence: Ki-67 decreased from 13% in biopsy specimens to 5% in the lumpectomy specimens (p<0.001)
